subject: Re: [junit] Latest JUnit 4.7 snapshot, includes assertion on expected 	exception message text
msgSnippet: ... Not yet.  We want to upgrade to 1.2 and get mismatch descriptions first: http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#list Soon. David Saff
messageBody:
On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 3:01 AM, Nat Pryce <nat.pryce@...> wrote:
> 2009/5/27 David Saff <david@...>:
>> All,
>>
>> In the latest snapshot build of JUnit 4.7, we’ve re-implemented
>> expected exceptions using Interceptors.
>
> Great!
>
>>                        thrown.expectMessage("happened?");
>
> Can you specify the expected message with Hamcrest matchers?  E.g:
> something like:
>
>    thrown.expectMessage(containsStringsInOrder("what", "happened?"));

Not yet. We want to upgrade to 1.2 and get mismatch descriptions first:

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#list

Soon.

David Saff
